title: Installation issue: adios2 on NERSC Cori
body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on NERSC Cori (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.1.217`:

The Spack environment used to install `adios2` is attached below along with the full build log.

```
$> spack -e . install
...
==> Installing adios2
==> adios2: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> adios2: Executing phase: 'build'
...
     1111    icpc: command line warning #10121: overriding '-xCORE-AVX2' with '-march=haswell'
     1112
  >> 1113    ": internal error: ** The compiler has encountered an unexpected problem.
     1114    ** Segmentation violation signal raised. **
     1115    Access violation or stack overflow. Please contact Intel Support for assistance.
     1116
  >> 1117    icpc: error #10106: Fatal error in /global/common/cori_cle7/software/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2020_update1_cluster_edition/compilers_and_libraries_2020.1.217/linux/bin
             /intel64/mcpcom, terminated by segmentation violation
  >> 1118    icpc: error #10014: problem during multi-file optimization compilation (code 1)
  >> 1119    make[2]: *** [source/adios2/CMakeFiles/adios2_core.dir/build.make:1831: lib64/libadios2_core.so.2.6.0] Error 1
     1120    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-adios2-2.6.0-f2bihbqzyhhimmm4yompxrozcrqhcnj4/spack-build'
  >> 1121    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1263: source/adios2/CMakeFiles/adios2_core.dir/all] Error 2
     1122    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-adios2-2.6.0-f2bihbqzyhhimmm4yompxrozcrqhcnj4/spack-build'
     1123    make: *** [Makefile:133: all] Error 2
```

Full build log: [adios2-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5022802/adios2-build-out.txt)
Spack environment: [spack.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5022804/spack.yaml.txt)
